Subject: Unable to Login In Web UI
Description:
Hello Team,

Our customer, RSTACK SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED, has hosted their EPP server on Azure but is currently unable to log in to the web UI. Most users, including the root user, are experiencing incorrect password errors.

Could we schedule a call tomorrow to address this issue? Their production environment is down, and timely assistance is crucial.

Best Regards,
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: Try to login in the UI login page
What_We_Know__c:
- connected to the backend and reset the password for the root account
- they have 4 administrator accounts
Next_Steps__c:
- schedule a session with the customer
- connect to the backend and reset the password for the root account
Solution_Comment__c: Connected to the backend and reset the password for the root account
